sentences.en: Academic preparation for management : Management: Principles of management, organization theory, behavioral science.
sentences.cn: 大学时为治理所做的学术预备: 治理学: 治理学原理 、 组织理论 、 行为学.

sentences.en: Another group received cognitive behavioral therapy, sometimes called the talking treatment.
sentences.cn: 另一组则使用认知行为疗法, 该疗法有时被称为谈话治疗.

sentences.en: Attitudes are behavioral manifestations of emotions, and while we can't control our emotions, we can control our behavior.
sentences.cn: 态度的情感，行为表现，虽然我们不能控制我们的情绪，我们可以控制我们的行为。

sentences.en: Both my mother and grandmother were diagnosed with depression. I saw more behavioral symptoms in them, but I knew they were taking medication and they seemed to have it under control.
sentences.cn: 我的母亲和曾祖母都曾被诊断为抑郁症，在她们身上我见得更多的是行为的异常，但我知道她们也用药并且症状控制得似乎不错。

sentences.en: But frankly, we believe his behavioral problems start at home!
sentences.cn: 但坦白的说, 我们认为他的问题出在家里面!

sentences.en: Daniel Kahneman ? s findings in the field are now known as behavioral economics.
sentences.cn: 主要介绍诺贝尔奖得主DanielKahneman在行为经济学领域的主要贡献.

sentences.en: From behavioral quirks to brain cancer, researchers have looked for any health risks associated with cellphone radiation for years.
sentences.cn: 从行为怪癖到脑癌，数年来研究人员一直在寻找与手机辐射有关的健康风险。

sentences.en: Hunting site is determined primarily by inherited behavioral characteristics.
sentences.cn: 追逐的场所主要取决于捕食者内在的行为特点.

sentences.en: It helps point out some of the behavioral barriers you have in making better food choices.
sentences.cn: 而且当你在选择更好的食物的时候它也可以帮助你指出一些行为障碍。

sentences.en: It is the behavioral responses which allow man to live in a cold climate.
sentences.cn: 这是使人能在寒冷气候下生活的行为反应.

sentences.en: Leptin improved animal body weight recovery and behavioral parameters after cerebral ischemia.
sentences.cn: 来普汀能改善脑缺血后的动物体重恢复及行为指标.

sentences.en: Marschak, 1965 , " The Economics of Language " , Behavioral Science, vol. 10 , pp . 135 - 140.
sentences.cn: 中译本: 罗蒂,《哲学与自然之镜》, 李幼蒸译, 北京:商务印书馆1987年出版.

sentences.en: Overconfidence and regret aversion are two basic concepts in behavioral finance.
sentences.cn: 摘要过度自信与后悔厌恶是投资者普遍存在的两种心理偏差.

sentences.en: Platform and posture are closely related: Different hardware platforms are conducive to different behavioral stances.
sentences.cn: 平台和姿态是紧密关联的,不同硬件平台有益于不同的行为姿态.

sentences.en: Prezygotic isolation falls into two categories: ecological and behavioral.
sentences.cn: 前合子隔离分两类: 生态学的和行为学的.

sentences.en: Rendered on a computer display, there are opportunities for animating behavioral diagrams so that they either simulate an executable system or mirror the actual behavior of a system that's executing.
sentences.cn: 行为图能生动的显示在计算机的显示器上，这个机遇使得它们可以模拟执行系统或是反映一个正在运行系统的实际行为。

sentences.en: The micro / macro distinction is also important with respect to the conceptual origin of behavioral relations.
sentences.cn: 微观和宏观区别,在表明行为关系的概念起源方面也颇重要.

sentences.en: There are few established behavioral conventions for them, particularly with respect to terminating commands.
sentences.cn: 非模态对话框很少建立行为规范, 尤其是终止命令.

sentences.en: This led me, as a behavioral economist, to an intriguing hypothesis.
sentences.cn: 这让我，作为一个行为经济学家，想到一个有趣的假设。

sentences.en: Though some patients have explored additional, more behavioral methods.
sentences.cn: 有些病人还使用了一些附加的行为疗法.

sentences.en: Were the behavioral variables ( see Chapter 4 ) you identified valid?
sentences.cn: 你发现并确定的这些行为变量 ( 参见第4章 ) 是否有效?

words.tran_cn: 行为；习性；运行状况（等于behavior）

phrases.tran_cn: 行为经济学（经济学的一个范畴，研究实际决策程序对最后作出决策的影响）
